verses.verse: My son,<WH1121> do not forget<WH7911> my teaching,<WH8451> But let your heart<WH3820> keep<WH5341> my commandments;<WH4687>
For length<WH753> of days<WH3117> and years<WH8141> of life,<WH9132> And peace<WH7965> they will add<WH3254> to you.
Do not let kindness<WH2617> and truth<WH571> leave<WH5800> you; Bind<WH7194> them around<WH5921> your neck,<WH1621> Write<WH3789> them on the tablet<WH3871> of your heart.<WH3820>
So you will find<WH4672> favor<WH2580> and good<WH2896> repute<WH7922> In the sight<WH5869> of God<WH430> and man.<WH120>
Trust<WH982> in the Lord<WH3068> with all<WH3605> your heart,<WH3820> And do not lean<WH8172> on your own understanding.<WH998>
In all<WH3605> your ways<WH1870> acknowledge<WH3045> Him, And He will make<WH3474> your paths<WH734> straight.<WH3474>
Do not be wise<WH2450> in your own eyes;<WH5869> Fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> and turn<WH5493> away<WH5493> from evil.<WH9563>
It will be healing<WH7500> to your body,<WH8270> And refreshment<WH8250> to your bones.<WH6106>
Honor<WH3513> the Lord<WH3068> from your wealth,<WH1952> And from the first<WH7225> of all<WH3605> your produce;<WH8393>
So your barns<WH618> will be filled<WH4390> with plenty,<WH7647> And your vats<WH3342> will overflow<WH6555> with new<WH8492> wine.<WH8492>
My son,<WH1121> do not reject<WH3988> the discipline<WH4148> of the Lord,<WH3068> Or loathe<WH6973> His reproof,<WH9640>
For whom<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> loves<WH157> He reproves,<WH3198> Even as a father, the son<WH1> in whom he delights.<WH1121>
How blessed<WH835> is the man<WH120> who finds<WH4672> wisdom,<WH2451> And the man<WH120> who gains<WH6329> understanding.<WH8394>
For its profit<WH5504> is better<WH2896> than<WH4480> the profit<WH5504> of silver,<WH3701> And its gain<WH8393> than<WH4480> fine gold.<WH2742>
She is more<WH4480> precious<WH3368> than<WH4480> jewels;<WH6443> And nothing<WH3605> <WH3808> you desire<WH2656> compares<WH9586> with her.
Long<WH753> life<WH3117> is in her right<WH3225> hand;<WH3225> In her left<WH8040> hand<WH8040> are riches<WH6239> and honor.<WH9202>
Her ways<WH1870> are pleasant<WH5278> ways,<WH1870> And all<WH3605> her paths<WH9350> are peace.<WH7965>
She is a tree<WH6086> of life<WH9132> to those who take<WH2388> hold<WH2388> of her, And happy<WH833> are all who hold<WH8551> her fast.<WH8551>
The Lord<WH3068> by wisdom<WH2451> founded<WH3245> the earth;<WH776> By understanding<WH8394> He established<WH3559> the heavens.<WH8064>
By His knowledge<WH1847> the deeps<WH8415> were broken<WH1234> up, And the skies<WH7834> drip<WH7491> with dew.<WH2919>
My son,<WH1121> let them not depart<WH3868> from your sight;<WH5869> Keep<WH5341> sound<WH8454> wisdom<WH8454> and discretion,<WH4209>
So they will be life<WH9132> to your soul,<WH5315> And adornment<WH2580> to your neck.<WH1621>
Then<WH227> you will walk<WH1980> in your way<WH1870> securely,<WH983> And your foot<WH7272> will not stumble.<WH5062>
When<WH518> you lie<WH7901> down,<WH7901> you will not be afraid;<WH6342> When you lie<WH7901> down,<WH7901> your sleep<WH8142> will be sweet.<WH6149>
Do not be afraid<WH3372> of sudden<WH6597> fear,<WH6343> Nor<WH408> of the onslaught<WH9585> of the wicked<WH7563> when<WH3588> it comes;<WH935>
For the Lord<WH3068> will be your confidence,<WH3689> And will keep<WH8104> your foot<WH7272> from being caught.<WH3921>
Do not withhold<WH4513> good<WH9185> from those to whom it is due,<WH1167> When it is in your power<WH3027> to do<WH6213> [it.]
Do not say<WH559> to your neighbor,<WH7453> "Go,<WH1980> and come<WH7725> back,<WH7725> And tomorrow<WH4279> I will give<WH5414> [it,]" When you have<WH3426> it with you.
Do not devise<WH9177> harm<WH9567> against<WH5921> your neighbor,<WH7453> While he lives<WH3427> in security<WH983> beside<WH854> you.
Do not contend<WH7378> with a man<WH120> without<WH2600> cause,<WH2600> If<WH518> he has done<WH1580> you no<WH3808> harm.<WH9567>
Do not envy<WH7065> a man<WH376> of violence,<WH2555> And do not choose<WH977> any<WH3605> of his ways.<WH1870>
For the crooked<WH3868> [man] is an abomination<WH8441> to the Lord;<WH3068> But He is intimate<WH5475> with the upright.<WH3477>
The curse<WH3994> of the Lord<WH3068> is on the house<WH1004> of the wicked,<WH7563> But He blesses<WH1288> the dwelling<WH5116> of the righteous.<WH6662>
Though<WH518> He scoffs<WH9238> at the scoffers,<WH9238> Yet He gives<WH5414> grace<WH2580> to the afflicted.<WH6035>
The wise<WH2450> will inherit<WH5157> honor,<WH9202> But fools<WH3684> display<WH7311> dishonor.<WH7036>
